All the studies given to our youth should be of that character that will make them the most successful in the service of God; and such as will enable them to follow in the footsteps of Christ. Study the life of Christ. Follow Him from the manger to Calvary. Act as He acted. The great principles which He maintained, you are to maintain. Your standard is to be the 


                                  -380- 

character of Him who was pure, and holy, and undefiled.--Manuscript 11, 1898, pp. 1, 2, 4, 5. ("The Word of God as a Study Book," June 29, 1898.)
